website_summaries.verdict: You could do a lot worse than the DC40; however, you could also do better and spend less.
pros: The DC40 Origin is a good-looking vacuum that functions well, but it’s not a showstopper in terms of performance
cons: Fragile-feeling hardware makes it hard to feel confident in the DC40’s durability and staying power

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to maintain
customer_reviews.text: Attempting to clean/empty the cyclone canister will try your patience to the max. In fact, there is no way to get the fine dust that’s packed in at the top, removed. After wasting time with Dyson customer service to no avail, I was told to take a leaf blower to it! Can you imagine that?! To design a product that causes such frustration to maintain, for a big company like Dyson, is inexcusable. When making a big purchase, you count on the reputation of the manufacturer, I’m greatly disappointed with their fake guarantee & extremely poor customer service. No wonder there are so many bad reviews for the “famous” Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repair Center - Terrible Experience
customer_reviews.text: Upon initial use this Dyson was great, however, we took our Dyson to the professional for a free repair covered by the warranty to discover they damaged the product further and denying such when it is obvious that part was removed for the repair - pryed by a screwdriver or something. I was informed that part of the machine was not covered by the warranty and better off purchasing a new. This was in the first 12mths of ownership :-( Loved the product, extremely dissatisfied with the "professional experts" who serviced the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ann Creger

customer_reviews.title: A super vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A super vacuum cleaner! It does have a learning curve to master it, however, especially if you're used to a canister type vacuum. I kept the instruction booklet handy and consulted it often. It's well written and illustrated, and probably you'll only dump the contents of the dirt receptacle on the floor once before you figure out that emptying it isn't as intuitive as you thought it would be. Really, though, it's incredibly well designed and a masterful piece of engineering. Cleans up the hardwood floors and carpets really well too.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce D.

customer_reviews.title: As with all newer versions of previously working excellent models, they have cut a few corners
customer_reviews.text: As with all newer versions of previously working excellent models, they have cut a few corners. Suction as great as ever, but very fiddly construction make this tricky to empty and to detach hose for corners etc. And they have used the old profit making standby of shortening the cord, so the first thing I did was buy an extension cord to be able to actually clean two rooms without endlessly changing the wall socket.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC40, Best Vacuum, you'll ever buy!  Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: This Dyson DC40 is all you want in a vacuum! I know, but Bill look at the price! Please if it cost a $1000 it would be worth it! The Best vacuum you'll ever own, period! I'm not going to get, into the technical details of this outstanding machine! It is a very well thought out design, you'll feel it from the moment you start to use it! Enjoy cleaning, Dyson DC40, makes quick work of this chore!

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed using it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for one year. It stopped working today. I followed numerous instructions to make sure there were no clogs, filters were clean, etc. but it still doesn't work. I chatted on-line with Dyson just now and they want me to bring it for repair to a store about 25 miles away. I do so hope they can fix the problem. I have enjoyed using it. I would have preferred getting it serviced from a much closer location!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Stover

customer_reviews.title: I replaced it with another one and still not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: First I got the defective product. I replaced it with another one and still not happy at all. I think the problen is this particular model. Should not buy this model. There is a newer model in the market (littile more money), it may be better.
customer_reviews.author: Atul

customer_reviews.title: Super lighweight easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this little vacuum for over a year now. Super lightweight and easy to use. After using my old dinosaur of a vacuum for so long, pushing this one around is a breeze. My favorite feature is the ease of emptying the dust/dirt collector. You push a release button and take it by the handle to your waste bin, push the button again and the bottom drops open releasing the contents. So simple. I wish the cord were longer and that is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Buy Your Wife A Dyson, She'll Love You Forever
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her new Dyson DC40 vacuum cleaner. As a matter of fact, she vacuums everyday and we have now realized there's more dust and dirt in our carpets than we could have ever imagined! It's lightweight, it goes around furniture easy with the ball and it's powerful. No worries about dog hair anymore either. She bugged me for five years for a Dyson and I'm glad I finally bought her one!
customer_reviews.author: Galen A. Smith Sr.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a Dyson forever and I finally bought this one and I love it! I have 5 dogs and 2 cats with 2 children added in, so, you can imagine what my hardwood floors can look like after only a day. This works great on hardwood. I don't like the hose so much because it is hard to pull away from the vacuum but it works great as well. It gets ALL the hair off my stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Monti

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! It is not difficult to use like some people have said. It maneuvers great around anything. The first time I used this vacuum I was amazed with how much dirt it picked up. My Oreck obviously was not doing the job. The only down side is that it is very messy when dumping all the dirt. I feel like there's got to be a better way so that dust does not fly everywhere when dumping it. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hart

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, lousy instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice vacuum, once you figure out how to assemble it. The owners manual leaves a lot to be desired. Cartoon pictures that can be pretty confusing if you have never had an upright. Still, I was very impressed by the vacuum cleaner itself. My maid loves me now and she reports that this is a very nice vacuum. Far better than the Hoover it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry SuperSport

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Suction seems to have gotten weaker over time but probably need to clean it. The durability of this vacuum is insane. It fell from 2nd floor into the 1st over 20step stair case and works like a charm. Just minor plastic chips but still fully functional
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Su

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! I have been wanting a Dyson for years and finally took the plunge and bought one. It's sturdy, well designed and is a breeze to empty. I've been using it regularly for several months and have no loss of suction. The tools it comes with are really handy and it goes from my rug to my hardwood floor to the linoleum in my kitchen without any issue. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: September71

customer_reviews.title: Coming from DC07, DC40 is a toy
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a DC-07, my purchase of the DC40 was a regret. The canister is tiny and the power cord is very short. I should have gotten the bigger one. We've used it once and will likely give this away and restore the DC07 and eventually get the DC65.
customer_reviews.author: BW-KD

customer_reviews.title: It works disgustingly amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my dyson!!!’ I will never buy another brand of vacuum again. I am a bit obsessive with my vacuuming and was shocked to see his how well this vacuum worked! I was quit frankly a little disgusted in how well it works!!! I never pictured myself spending as much as I did but I will always be a dyson fan from now on
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: I excepted more from a Dyson. Very hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: I excepted more from a Dyson. Very hard to clean. Canister is smaller than expected - I have to dump it 3 times every time I vacuum the entire house.
customer_reviews.author: William Mccamey

customer_reviews.title: but it's TERRIBLE on carpet
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough on hard floors, but it's TERRIBLE on carpet. It doesn't even look like I vacuumed, there's still tons of pet hair and other items in the carpet. Really unfortunate because it was really expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my Dyson. It's lightweight and easy to maneuver and cleans up great. I like that the attachments ride right along on the upright, but I have to say the hose is quite stiff and keeps pulling away. You have to pull on it with one hand in order to be able to control the working end. with the other hand. I really can't give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: G. MacGamwell

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum great price
customer_reviews.text: So far this is an awesome vacuum and I look forward to doing the vacuum. It is fast, light, great suction, clean carpet. The width is little bit less than my last one but doesn't matter. great vacuum and great price on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin the Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: While I like the Dyson, I don't think this model was worth the price. It vacuums well enough, but I don't like that I can't get under furniture with it. I would probably buy one of the more expensive models next time. Overall I do recommend Dyson vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey S

customer_reviews.title: Every bit as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We had a vacuum, but it quit working. In the short time we waited for our Dyson, it wasn't like we made a huge mess of the carpet. But after the first pass, the Dyson had drawn an appalling amount of filth from the carpet. This is the first vacuum that made us feel healthier after use.
customer_reviews.author: brotherspartan

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say enough how much I love this! I can't believe how much dirt it ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough how much I love this! I can't believe how much dirt it picks up compared to my other one that was still considered "functioning". I think this is an amazing value for the price. I am so happy I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have a small condo or apt
customer_reviews.text: If you've used a full size Dyson, this is 80% of the build quality, 50% of the capacity, and 50% of the price. Great if you have a small condo or apt. If you have a full sized house, bite the bullet and buy one of the larger models.
customer_reviews.author: Scrubs

customer_reviews.title: I love the feature that lets me go from carpet to ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I waited for so long to get one of these! I don't have a lot of carpeting but what I do have seems to grab lint and small dirt and my Hoover just could not get it up without me either going over the rug 10 times or reaching down to loosen the lint! This gets it in the first effort and the machine is so much lighter and easier to use. I love the feature that lets me go from carpet to hardwood to tile.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Trucksess

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for as a gift for my mother. She still has it to this day! The suction is still great and the maneuverability.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great for a lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Good lightweight machine. Don't expect the same suction as the bigger heavier models. It's adequate though for lighter overall cleaning. The canister is smaller and needs to be emptied more frequently but it's easy. But I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Newbie

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my dyson
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my dyson!! First time ever owning one and I cannot say enough wonderful things about this cleaner. It's perfect for my family!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great machine except for ....
customer_reviews.text: I got the DC40 in a different color. Instead of the yellow/gray color scheme that I wanted, it was all grey. The distributor had no way of knowing what's the actual color inside the box without opening it. They said that's the stock photo they were given to advertise the product. As for the vacuum suction power, it works very well. The design is nice except for the wand & hose set-up. When I used the wand to vacuum, I have to bend the hose which I thought was awkward to use and hold. I wished it had a curve design to hold the wand comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Nitestorm

customer_reviews.title: REALLY SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Man, this thing really sucks! I didn't realize just how much my old vacuum was leaving behind until I ran the DC40 over the living room carpet. Had to empty the canister right away! The extendable wand is a great feature for cleaning walls, stairs etc. Seems very well made and I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: olhipe

customer_reviews.title: We think so far it's a good buy, pricey but hope to have this for ...
customer_reviews.text: It's light, EZ putting together and picks up well. I'm just used to that look of vacuum cleaners leaving those lines over areas and this one doesn't. Not a deal breaker and the suction on this thing is incredible. We think so far it's a good buy, pricey but hope to have this for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Bangah

customer_reviews.title: Just getting to know it
customer_reviews.text: Well, I bought it mostly because my cleaning help had used it at my daughter's and liked it a lot. I have only used it a little and it has been fine. I won't really know how much I like it until I have tried to use the hose to get into corners and also tried emptying the clear bin. My cleaning help is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: amgrandma

customer_reviews.title: like I am
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. The head falls off constantly. It is brand new, I am an aircraft mechanic and assembled and reassembled it three times, and I am telling you do not buy this thing. It is junk and you will be very unhappy... like I am. OK, Dyson finally sent the missing part that holds the head on and it seems to work. I does not pick up a lot of things on a tile floor. If I had it to do over, I would not do it.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance M. O'mahoney

customer_reviews.title: My sister who has same vacuum said it's not supposed to be like that. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: When tried to assemble parts together, i had so much hard time fitting one part near the handle. I don't know why. My sister who has same vacuum said it's not supposed to be like that. Unfortunately, my dad threw away all the boxes that I couldn't ask for return. It's working fine but i am scared to de-assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jeong Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum we have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Researched product and found in on sale, still it was more expensive than the other brands. But after seeing how Dyson test their products and stand behind them, it was well worth the money. Best vacuum we have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: John E Lawst

customer_reviews.title: It's a Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Dyson! Easy to maneuver, beautifully designed, not too loud, easy to clean, but power cord seems a little short. Wish that it was a little longer (That's what she said!)(Ha). Worth the money? Yes, I believe so.
customer_reviews.author: Goldfish

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Have need a new vaccumm for a month or so and now that I have my Dyson I am a cleaning freak. Best present my husband ever got me!! I don't have animals but I have a two year old boy so this one is perfect for us
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, easy to maneuver, and clean. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kat19

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Warranty Service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 2 1/2 years ago. Recently tripped over it and broke the housing (as I made clear when I brought it in for repair). They covered it under warranty. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps not a real Dyson?
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson and the first is still operating in tip top form. The newer one which I purchased through Amazon has broken twice and does not function with nearly the power as my first one. the hose is stiff and the attachments to not fit properly. It would seem we purchased a knock-off through Amazon. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: musicmenman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Until we got to clean our house with the Dyson i think i never really had a clean apartment! I did use my previous vacuum cleaner a couple of days before we got the Dyson. In order to verify if it worked well, and to make sure i understood how to use it, i assembled the parts (which was so intuitive!), and i used in the apartment. I was surprised to see how much dust it picked up and in my mind the apartment was already clean. The best performance was observed in the carpet/rugs area! best buy ever overall for someone like me who has to deal with asthma!
customer_reviews.author: lsalvi

customer_reviews.title: Do not like this!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Dyson less than a year ago and this weekend it quit working. Compared to our very Dyson animal this one is terrible. Never has worked as well. I do not recommend it at all!
customer_reviews.author: JDV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum! Only peeve is that it's bag less ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum! Only peeve is that it's bag less so there's extra work involved to wash out the filter and container once a month. But it seems most of the contemporary vacuums are set up that way. Otherwise, vacuum works great. Picks up all the cat fur and sand. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Minion2

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, but price range should be lower to be par with performance
customer_reviews.text: suction is not as good as other cheaper Dyson vacuum cleaners, but is better than any other vacuums out there. Price is ok but Dyson should have this product in the 200-300 range for its performance. the vaccum seems a bit too fragile and I wish dyson made the plastic body more durable. Have to be very careful to not damage it. 1 month update: still running great but the brush attachments that came with the vacuum have already worn out!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: it's really great, if you're hesitant to buy it, don't be it's really worth the price and like a 5year warrantee that you activate comes with it, so even if it does break, you can get it replaced. vs. buying cheap vacuums and having to replace every 6months
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good sweeper, picks up nice and is fantastic for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sweeper, picks up nice and is fantastic for going between hard floors and area rugs frequently. 3 stars because it doesn't stand upright on its own all that well.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Dyson is for real.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and easy to assemble. Does a marvelous job on both wood floors and carpets. Would be even better with a longer and self retracting cord. Easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Bob, MD.

customer_reviews.title: Suction is great with the wand
customer_reviews.text: Suction is great with the wand, however we are having some issues with the beater suction. Lacking it feels like.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Dyson.....gift for my daughter....she loves it too!! I've used many brands....will use Dyson from now on. Good quality...user friendly. I put my daughter's together without reading the instructions. Put the c-clamp on incorrectly & it broke. I called Dyson. Got one in the mail same week...No Charge. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Sue M Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Have a central vac and bought the Dyson to use instead. This woks much better than our central vacuum which is considered top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: RWK

customer_reviews.title: ... in my house and I have to say I love it so glad I ordered it I dint realize ...
customer_reviews.text: My new dyson was just delivered it came very fast and I took it out of the box as soon as I got it in my house and I have to say I love it so glad I ordered it I dint realize how much dust was on my hard wood floors and in my big area rug even after sweeping it my new dyson picked up everything I don't get with my broom and it's amazing I love love love it so far so excited to keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: I love it! We have a white angora cat
customer_reviews.text: I've had a canister vacuum for years, and wasn't quite sure that I wanted an upright. I love it! We have a white angora cat, and it works wonderfully on her hair. It's a lot easier on my back, and I'm not always getting tangled with the cord and canister.
customer_reviews.author: B. Macdonough

customer_reviews.title: Always pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Use this everyday, came and works as expected! Or better!
customer_reviews.author: Tom McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It is the most powerful vacuum we have ever owned. All features are useful and intelligently placed. Only downside is it's possible durability. Vacuum is a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: fleet56

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy Vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and pleasantly surprised to find out that he enjoys using it as he sees dramatic results compared to his previous vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Callan

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the DC40.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. Works great. Picks up debris/dirt well on hard flooring as well as carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Star Mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble. When we tried to snap two parts together, we had a difficult time, but it eventually worked. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Y

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a masterpiece! It replaced our old one and it brought us into the me century. Buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Steve de Laet, sdelaet@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Had to get another Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson. The last one I still have and it is about eight years old. A switch to go from attachments to floor broke. Since it was a $200 fix, I bought another. No regrets. I could not clean up after a family of three teenagers, a dog, and a messy husband without it! The attachments are a little tricky at first. Once you get used to it you understand that nothing compares to a Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Laura K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Love Dyson vacs. This is my second, one for each floor. This vac is easy to maneuver and the suction is very strong. The canister is small and needs to be emptied more often.
customer_reviews.author: GED

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Finally I got a Dyson vacuum after years of wanting one. Great suction, maneuvers well around objects. The brush seems too powerful as the bin collects what appears to be lint from the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Liu Yunxia

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Very good vacuum for the price - it works well, but I do wish it was a little more powerful, or maybe it's just my rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Paolucci

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Robust motor. Cheap flimsy housing. It's amazing how much debris it vacuums up.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Martinez II

customer_reviews.title: Dyson-worth every extra penny
customer_reviews.text: This does the trick. Its lightweight but has a strong motor that picks up stuff we did not even know was there. Dyson may be more expensive than some models, but after trying cheaper models there really is no comparison spluge for the Dyson and you will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nick

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum itsself is nice i like that it is lighter than the ones ...
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum itsself is nice i like that it is lighter than the ones from 20 yrs ago. Very disappointed with attachment. It does not have the attachments that description states or that pictures show.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Welker

customer_reviews.title: It works great and I wholly recommend it.  Takes the place of s big vacuum and a hand held when a long time use is needed
customer_reviews.text: It lived up to all the promises. It works great and I wholly recommend it. Takes the place of s big vacuum and a hand held when a long time use is needed
customer_reviews.author: jelly belly

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE DYSON. AMAZING PRODUCT. SO POWERFUL. DEFINITELY WORTH THE MONEY. I WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER BRAND AGAIN. DYSON ALL THE WAY
customer_reviews.author: Stella Khan

customer_reviews.title: PRICESMART IS HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT DEAL WITH PRICESMART..I had a problem with vacuum not working --no suction. Pricesmart refused to help. I will never deal with the again .
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. maybe a tad underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. maybe a tad underpowered. power cord is maddeningly short. Otherwise, maneuverable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: easily assembled, looks good and after initial vacuum of ...
customer_reviews.text: easily assembled, looks good and after initial vacuum of the house it collected a huge amount of crap. Wow, I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My friends cautioned against it because it is all plastic, but I've had no problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: J Brad Kallmyer

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Good Vacuum slight wear as it was a used item but I hooked it all up and it works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Dyson vacuum. It maneuvers very well in small places and does a great job on the wood floor as well on the carpet. I have another Dyson which I really like but this one is even better. It is light weight and picks up lots of dirt, sand, etc. in every room even though we are very clean people. So there you go. Dyson DC40 is a winner!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Harris

customer_reviews.title: The handle was broken in the latch mechanism so I ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle was broken in the latch mechanism so I couldn't even try it out. Rats!
customer_reviews.author: Breadqueen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best sweeper best price and it sucks up stuff so well.
customer_reviews.author: Dewey R. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: After trying many of the pet hair models, this is by far worth the money. My only complaint would be that the tank is a little small and the hose a little difficult to figure out at first, but a great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: amanda c

customer_reviews.title: We love it. It thoroughly cleans both rugs & bare ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It thoroughly cleans both rugs & bare floors without adjusting. Its dirt canister is easy to empty. It maneuvers easily.
customer_reviews.author: VELSTAR

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing vacuum. The woman who cleans our house "test ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing vacuum. The woman who cleans our house "test drives" every kind of vacuum in the course of her work, and this is the one she told us to buy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Millard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An awesome vaccuum and it was delivered earlier than the estimated date!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Martin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously don't know how I lived without this!!! Love my dyson worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Erick DuPree

customer_reviews.title: No other vacs are this good.
customer_reviews.text: this is my third Dyson vac. No other vacs are this good.
customer_reviews.author: dean323

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great purchase. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot of suction for such a small and light weight vac.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Knows

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC40 must try!!
customer_reviews.text: I alway wanted a Dyson, so for the price I thought I would try it!! It is a lightweight vacuum with a lot of power!! It picks up great!! I would recommend it for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Clarizio

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Arrive on time, easy to put together, works well, all good.
customer_reviews.author: frank thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner as it cleans so well
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged! Great vacuum cleaner as it cleans so well!
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light, portable, quiet, powerful, and dependable. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: stefan

customer_reviews.title: Best vacumn cleaner ever.
customer_reviews.text: A Dyson vacumn cleaner cannot be beat for pulling cat hair out of carpeting. The Dyson is the best vacumn on the market and all of the reviews are true.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, lightweight and picks up much more than my other vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: SuAZ

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum - easy to use and if there is ...
customer_reviews.text: Good vacuum - easy to use and if there is a clog, easy to take apart.
customer_reviews.author: D. Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: I must have gotten a lemon. It lasted a ...
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a lemon. It lasted a month before needing the head replaced. The replacement lasted about a month as well. I donated it to Salvation Army thinking they might have someone to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum it's light and seems to be very easy to use and works well. I'm coming from a Hoover wind tunnel which I was never happy with so this is like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Shoehore

customer_reviews.title: incredible product
customer_reviews.text: words of advice for Dyson products: the absolute best time to buy is def. during the black friday-cyber monday week!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Had no idea my rug was so dirty ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Had no idea my rug was so dirty until I used this Dyson vacuum cleaner. Has terrific suction.
customer_reviews.author: carleen

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Love my Dyson DC40 vacuum cleaner. I have used the Dyson product before I am soo happy to finally have one myself.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Dyson = TROUBLE
customer_reviews.text: Aweful design. It keeps clogging after light use. Had to spend $45 to get it 'unclogged' by a local repair shop. Then, it did it again. I am going to try to return it. For the price that this thing cost, not worth it....
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Paragano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dad loves the vacuum, I have also been using it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to get out of the box and assemble. I had to call for help.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lipow

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum, it performs well. I changed the bag on my old vacuum. Spent 20 vacuuming and then tried out the Dyson. Picked up two canisters of dust and what not out of the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Michelle Vandenberg

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a different dyson at home. This one is nice because is so much lighter. The only thing I don't like is that it feels like it might be made with cheaper plastic. I run a small cleaning business and this one works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly Cimuchowski

product_meta.title: Dyson DC40 Origin Upright Vacuum Cleaner
product_meta.description:
Color:YellowAMAZON.COM





DC40 Origin is a Dyson Ball upright vacuum cleaner for every floor type. The machine’s cleaner head has an active base place, which self-adjusts automatically for optimal contact with all floor types. On hard floors the base plate lowers to create an efficient seal, and the brush bar lifts clear off the floor to protect delicate surfaces. On carpet, the base plate rises and the brush bar lowers for optimum bristle penetration- removing ground-in dirt and pet hair from different depths of carpet pile. And because the cleaner head adjusts automatically, there are no awkward dials and you don’t need to bend down to make adjustments. 

Dyson cyclones capture more dirt than any other cyclone. DC40 Origin has Radial Root Cyclone technology with remodeled airflows to maximize suction power. DC40 Multi floor also has patented Ball technology. It turns on the spot, which allows you to maneuver more easily around obstacles and into awkward spaces. And because the motor and other key components are located inside the ball, the machine has a lower center of gravity- making it even easier to steer. 

PATENTED DYSON TECHNOLOGY
Dyson engineers are constantly testing and inventing, trying to find new ways to make their technology better. As they work, they file patent applications to protect their inventions from copycat manufacturers. That’s why the only place you’ll find Dyson technology is inside a Dyson machine. 

Radial Root Cyclone technology: Ordinary vacuum cleaners rely on bags to trap dust and dirt. As you use them, the tiny holes in the bag clog up with particles of dust. This restricts the flow of air, so the vacuum cleaner loses suction. Dyson vacuum cleaners don’t rely on bags to trap dust and dirt. They use cyclone technology, which spins the air at incredibly high speeds. The cyclones inside a Dyson vacuum cleaner generate centrifugal forces many thousands of times the force of gravity. Dust, dirt and pet hair are flung out of the airflow and straight into the bin. No bag. No loss of suction. Dyson has been continually refining cyclone technology since inventing it more than 20 years ago. DC40 Origin has Radial Root Cyclone technology. Reconfigured air channels and improved flow efficiency reduce turbulence and preserve air pressure, so that the inner cyclones can extract more microscopic particles. These refinements help remove more dirt, dust, allergens and pet hair for the airflow. 

Ball technology to help you steer with ease: Dyson Ball upright vacuum cleaners use patented Ball technology to overcome the steering limitations of fixed wheels. They ride on a ball, which turns on the spot so you can steer with ease, changing direction with just a turn of the wrist. The ball itself is made of glass-reinforced polypropylene- the same material used in the manufacture of car dashboards. It combines high impact strength with the resistance to distortion. The ball also holds the heaviest component, (the motor), positioned towards the base for a lower center of gravity and greater stability. 

FEATURES
Self-adjusting cleaner head: Many upright vacuum cleaners use fixed settings and their cleaner heads don’t self-adjust to different floor types. And the bigger the gap between the cleaner head and floor, the more suction power is wasted. DC40 Origin has an active base plate. It creates the optimal cleaner head contact for every floor type, reducing air leaks and retaining suction power on all floor types- wood, carpet, vinyl and tile. 

Instant release wand: DC40 Origin has an instant release, long reach wand for cleaning stairs and awkward areas- it stretches up to 5 times in length. There are no separate parts to assemble. 

Extra tools: DC40 Origin comes with a Combination tool and a Stair tool. The Combination tool has a debris nozzle that converts to a brush tool for dusting. The Stair tool removes dirt and dust from corners and against vertical edges of stairs. 

Captures allergens, expels cleaner air: The Dyson DC40 Origin has HEPA filtration and a lifetime washable filter. Dyson cyclones capture microscopic particles down to 0.5 microns in size, including pollen, mold and bacteria.

Hygienic bin emptying with push button release: The bin on a Dyson vacuum cleaner is transparent so you can see when it needs emptying- and just how much dust, dirt and pet hair your new Dyson machine has picked up.

No extra costs: Other vacuum cleaners are still designed to need replacement bags and filters- and the cost soon adds up. Dyson vacuums don’t have bags and have lifetime washable filters, so there are no extra costs to worry about.

5 year parts and labor warranty: Your Dyson vacuum cleaner is likely to take a few knocks and bashes during everyday use- but that’s nothing compared to what Dyson puts its machines through during testing and development. All Dyson vacuum cleaners undergo a lengthy and rigorous testing program. That’s why DC40 Origin comes with a 5 year warranty- parts and labor guaranteed by Dyson.

 DYSON AUTHORIZED RESELLERS ON AMAZON.COM 
Only Dyson vacuums and fans purchased from an Authorized Reseller satisfy the quality assurance standards of Dyson and include a valid Dyson parts and labor warranty. Please see a full list of Authorized Amazon Marketplace Resellers here.

feature_bullets: 5 year parts & labor warranty when purchased from an authorized reseller
Radial Root Cyclone technology captures more dirt than any other cyclone. Remodeled airflows help remove more dirt, dust and allergens from the home.
Self-adjusting cleaner head maintains contract across all floor types. No awkward dials or bending down to adjust.
Ball technology- core components are inside the ball, creating a lower center of gravity. Easlier to steer into difficult places.
Durable- made from ABS and polycarbonate- the same materials used to make crash helmets and riot shields. Each component is relentlessly tested again and again.
